id: FREE Company Operating System Notion Template
name: FREE Company Operating System Notion Template
description: What is it?The Company Operating System by Canvas:OS is designed to help you build a better business for your people by embedding transparency, integration, and automation into your daily activities.Who is it for?Small, progressive companies that want a single integrated work platform that can be tailored to align with their aspirations. Replace your disconnected and cumbersome work management tools with a platform designed to help you propel your business forward!ðŸ’¡View more templates and tools
features: Mission, Vision, and Strategy pages; A database of progressive companies from around the world to draw inspiration from; Goals and OKRs integrated with products, projects, and teams; Product roadmap, feedback tools, and portals; Time-recording tool linked to projects and billing rates; Real-time performance and financial-tracking; Team spaces connected to product, project, task, and sprint databases; Flow-based metrics for teams to self-manage their continuous improvement; GitHub integration to enable a synced database of repos, update PRs, and more.; Comprehensive People Directory
